# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

add_executable(ydb-public-sdk-cpp-tests-integration-bulk_upsert)


target_link_libraries(ydb-public-sdk-cpp-tests-integration-bulk_upsert PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-cpp-cpuid_check
  cpp-testing-gtest
  cpp-testing-gtest_main
  src-client-driver
  src-client-table
)

target_allocator(ydb-public-sdk-cpp-tests-integration-bulk_upsert
  system_allocator
)

target_link_options(ydb-public-sdk-cpp-tests-integration-bulk_upsert PRIVATE
  -Wl,-platform_version,macos,11.0,11.0
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -framework
  CoreFoundation
)

target_sources(ydb-public-sdk-cpp-tests-integration-bulk_upsert PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/public/sdk/cpp/tests/integration/bulk_upsert/bulk_upsert.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/public/sdk/cpp/tests/integration/bulk_upsert/main.cpp
)


add_test(
  NAME
  ydb-public-sdk-cpp-tests-integration-bulk_upsert
  COMMAND
  ydb-public-sdk-cpp-tests-integration-bulk_upsert
)

set_property(
  TEST
  ydb-public-sdk-cpp-tests-integration-bulk_upsert
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)

set_property(
  TEST
  ydb-public-sdk-cpp-tests-integration-bulk_upsert
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
  "YDB_DRIVER_BINARY=ydb/apps/ydbd/ydbd"
)

set_property(
  TEST
  ydb-public-sdk-cpp-tests-integration-bulk_upsert
  PROPERTY
  TIMEOUT
  600
)

vcs_info(ydb-public-sdk-cpp-tests-integration-bulk_upsert)

set_property(
  TEST
  ydb-public-sdk-cpp-tests-integration-bulk_upsert
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
